dialogues.text: Welcome to Port Azure! My name is Mayor Wilson!
Feel free to explore this wonderful island however you wish. You will find that people here are very willing to teach you what they know!
First, you must be able to defend yourself from threats out there. Please see the Shop Owner next door to choose a weapon.
That weapon should protect you from dangers. Many cities and towns in Myrinnia face local troubles. Port Azure also has its problems.
Some people pursue these combat challenges and are often handsomely rewarded. This skill is called Bounty Hunter.
You should try out different skills and work on whichever you like best. To give you a taste of what Bounty Hunter is like, I'd like you to go outside and find the Bounty Board next to this building.
Just pick one of the listed bounties and complete it to receive a reward and some experience.
